title: The ICGA on the Web
abstract: The ICGA and its members can now communicate with each other and a wider public, as never before. The ICGA website ICGA_W, www.icga.org, will complement the ICGA Journal, providing more space and access to an evolving and wider range of items including both topical news and definitive reference material
